articles.title: Fractional quantum anomalous Hall effect in multilayer graphene - Nature.com
articles.description: Integer and fractional quantum anomalous Hall effects in a rhombohedral pentalayer graphene–hBN moiré superlattice are observed, providing an ideal platform for exploring charge fractionalization and (non-Abelian) anyonic braiding at zero magnetic field.
